verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w parables|strong="G3850"\w*. \wj A \+add certain\+add* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w planted|strong="G5452"\+w* \+w a vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w set|strong="G4060"\+w* \+w an hedge about|strong="G5418"\+w* \+add it\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w digged|strong="G3736"\+w* \+add a place for\+add* \+w the winefat|strong="G5276"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w built|strong="G3618"\+w* \+w a tower|strong="G4444"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w let|strong="G1554"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w out|strong="G1554"\+w* \+w to husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w went into a far country|strong="G0589"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w at the season|strong="G2540"\+w* \+w he sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w to|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w the husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w* \+w a servant|strong="G1401"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w he might receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w from|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w the husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w the fruit|strong="G2590"\+w* \+w of the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w they caught|strong="G2983"\+w* \+add him\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w beat|strong="G1194"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w away|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w empty|strong="G2756"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w again|strong="G3825"\+w* \+w he sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w servant|strong="G1401"\+w*; \+w and at him|strong="G2548"\+w* \+w they cast stones|strong="G3036"\+w*, \+w and wounded|strong="G2775"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w in the head|strong="G2775"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w away|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w shamefully handled|strong="G0821"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w again|strong="G3825"\+w* \+w he sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w another|strong="G0243"\+w*; \+w and him|strong="G2548"\+w* \+w they killed|strong="G0615"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w others|strong="G0243"\+w*; \+w beating|strong="G1194"\+w* \+w some|strong="G3588"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w killing|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w some|strong="G3588"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Having|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w son|strong="G5207"\+w*, \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w wellbeloved|strong="G0027"\+w*, \+w he sent|strong="G0649"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w last|strong="G2078"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w They will reverence|strong="G1788"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w son|strong="G5207"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w those|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w* \+w said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w among|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w themselves|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w This|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the heir|strong="G2818"\+w*; \+w come|strong="G1205"\+w*, \+w let us kill|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the inheritance|strong="G2817"\+w* \+w shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w ours|strong="G2257"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they took|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and killed|strong="G0615"\+w* \+add him\+add*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w cast|strong="G1544"\+w* \+add him\+add* \+w out of|strong="G1854"\+w* \+w the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w the lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w of the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4160"\+w*? \+w he will come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w destroy|strong="G0622"\+w* \+w the husbandmen|strong="G1092"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will give|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w the vineyard|strong="G0290"\+w* \+w unto others|strong="G0243"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And have ye|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3761"\+w* \+w read|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w scripture|strong="G1124"\+w*; \+w The stone|strong="G3037"\+w* \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the builders|strong="G3618"\+w* \+w rejected|strong="G0593"\+w* \+w is|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w become|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w the head|strong="G2776"\+w* \+w of the corner|strong="G1137"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w This|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w was|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w the Lord’s|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w doing|strong="G1096"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w marvellous|strong="G2298"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w our|strong="G2257"\+w* \+w eyes|strong="G3788"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* to lay \w hold|strong="G2902"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w* the \w parable|strong="G3850"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: and they \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* went their \w way|strong="G0565"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w send|strong="G0649"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Herodians|strong="G2265"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w catch|strong="G0064"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G3056"\w* \add his\add* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* they were \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, they \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w carest|strong="G3199"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* thou \w regardest|strong="G0991"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w person|strong="G4383"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w teachest|strong="G1321"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*: Is it \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w tribute|strong="G2778"\w* to \w Cæsar|strong="G2541"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*?

Shall we \w give|strong="G1325"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* shall \w we|strong="G1325"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w*? \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hypocrisy|strong="G5272"\w*, \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w tempt ye|strong="G3985"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*? \+w bring|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w a penny|strong="G1220"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w I may see|strong="G1492"\+w* \+add it\+add*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \add it\add*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Whose|strong="G5101"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w image|strong="G1504"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w superscription|strong="G1923"\+w*?\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Cæsar’s|strong="G2541"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Render|strong="G0591"\+w* \+w to Cæsar|strong="G2541"\+w* \+w the things that are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w Cæsar’s|strong="G2541"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w the things that are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w God’s|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* there \w is|strong="G1511"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

\w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w If|strong="G1437"\w* a \w man’s|strong="G5100"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w leave|strong="G2641"\w* \add his\add* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \add behind him\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w leave|strong="G0863"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* should \w take|strong="G2983"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* raise \w up|strong="G1817"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* unto \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

Now there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* a \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dying|strong="G0599"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* any \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w likewise|strong="G5615"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w had|strong="G2983"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*: \w last|strong="G2078"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* they shall \w rise|strong="G0450"\w*, \w whose|strong="G5101"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* shall she \w be|strong="G2071"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* to \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answering|strong="G0611"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Do ye|strong="G4105"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G5124"\+w* \+w err|strong="G4105"\+w*, \+w because|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w ye know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w the scriptures|strong="G1124"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3366"\+w* \+w the power|strong="G1411"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w they shall rise|strong="G0450"\+w* \+w from|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w*, \+w they|strong="G1060"\+w* \+w neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w marry|strong="G1060"\+w*, \+w nor|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w are given in marriage|strong="G1061"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w are|strong="G1526"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w the angels|strong="G0032"\+w* \+w which are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w as touching|strong="G4012"\+w* \+w the dead|strong="G3498"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w they rise|strong="G1453"\+w*: \+w have ye|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w read|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the book|strong="G0976"\+w* \+w of Moses|strong="G3475"\+w*, \+w how|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the bush|strong="G0942"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w spake|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w unto him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+add am\+add* \+w the God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of Abraham|strong="G0011"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of Isaac|strong="G2464"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of Jacob|strong="G2384"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w He is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w the God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of the dead|strong="G3498"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w the God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w of the living|strong="G2198"\+w*: \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w do|strong="G4105"\+w* \+w greatly|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w err|strong="G4105"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w*, and having \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* reasoning \w together|strong="G4802"\w*, and \w perceiving|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*, \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Which|strong="G4169"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w The first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w of all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w the commandments|strong="G1785"\+w* \+add is\+add*, \+w Hear|strong="G0191"\+w*, \+w O Israel|strong="G2474"\+w*; \+w The Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w our|strong="G2257"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thou shalt love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w the Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w heart|strong="G2588"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w soul|strong="G5590"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w mind|strong="G1271"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1537"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3650"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w strength|strong="G2479"\+w*: \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w the first|strong="G4413"\+w* \+w commandment|strong="G1785"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the second|strong="G1208"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w like|strong="G3664"\+w*, \+add namely\+add* \+w this|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w Thou shalt love|strong="G0025"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w neighbour|strong="G4139"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w thyself|strong="G4572"\+w*. \+w There is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w none|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w other|strong="G0243"\+w* \+w commandment|strong="G1785"\+w* \+w greater|strong="G3187"\+w* \+w than these|strong="G5130"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w scribe|strong="G1122"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Well|strong="G2573"\w*, \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, thou hast \w said|strong="G2036"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w but|strong="G4133"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w understanding|strong="G4907"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w soul|strong="G5590"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w strength|strong="G2479"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \add his\add* \w neighbour|strong="G4139"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* than \w all|strong="G3956"\w* whole burnt \w offerings|strong="G3646"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w*.
